mapper.select: select * from (select shop_seq,shop_id,shop_title,shop_contents, shop_writedate, shop_location, shop_expiration, shop_price, shop_quantity, shop_imagepath1, shop_imagepath2, shop_imagepath3, rank() over(order by shop_seq desc) rank from shopboard ) where rank between #{lastPage}-11 and #{lastPage}
mapper.update: update shopboard set shop_quantity=#{m1} where shop_seq=#{m2}
mapper.select: select avg(star_review) from shopreview where products_seq= #{shop_seq}
select count(*) from shopreview where products_seq = #{products_seq}
select shop_quantity from shopboard where shop_seq = #{value}
